title:
Efficient influence functions for Sobol' indices under two designs of
  experiments
authors:
Thierry Klein (ENAC, IMT), Agn\`es Lagnoux (IMT), Paul Rochet (OPTIM),
  Thi Mong Ngoc Nguyen
abstract:
In this note, we are interested in the asymptotic efficiency of Sobol'
indices esti-mators. After recalling the basis of asymptotic efficiency, we
compute the efficientinfluence functions for Sobol' indices in two different
contexts: the Pick-Freeze andthe given-data settings.
